name: Tear of the Forst
description:
Description: 
Tear of the Forest is a 2D interactive story with an isometric view. Tear wakes up in the middle of a forest wondering what happened to her. She does not remember anything, it seems she has lost her memories. She accidentally finds out that she can possess certain animals. Help Tear uncover parts of her past to help her get home.

This game was made for children aged 7 and older. Tear of the Forest aims to spread awareness about deforestation.

Team Imagine Potatoes:
- Mae Bono
- Benett Casama
- Johndel Del Valle
- Emil Magbanua
- Joseph Gerundo 

Game On! 2018 Awards:
- Public’s Choice
- Best Narrative and Story
